title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 §§ 271-7.17 - Dressing rooms and areas
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 §§ 271-7.17 - Dressing rooms and areas

State Regulations

If employees routinely change clothes within the
establishment, rooms or areas shall be designated and used for that purpose. These designated rooms or areas shall not be used for food preparation, food
storage, food display, warewashing or storage of utensils and
equipment. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
§§
271-7.17

New

York State Register June 22, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 25, eff. 6/22/2016

Adopted

New

York State Register December 21, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 51, eff. 12/21/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
